Reviews.Title: ASUS Memo 7 Inch Tablet
Reviews.Author: R. L. D. AMATO "RLDA"
Reviews.Content: I have had my unit for a few months.  No problems.  This is a great bargin and it perfoms better than my $350 ACER.  Screen is bright and very clear.

Reviews.Title: don't buy this
Reviews.Author: Kerri K.
Reviews.Content: This tablet only worked for four months, and I have spent the last four months arguing with Asus over why it's not working.  It's still under warranty!  I am so annoyed it's beyond belief.  I will never buy anything made by Asus again.
